Important Articles.headline: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.
Important Articles.title: Here's Why General Motors (GM) is a Strong Momentum Stock

Important Articles.headline: General Motors (NYSE:GM) recently announced a partnership with GM Energy and EnergyHub to integrate electric vehicles and energy storage solutions into utility programs across the U.S., providing financial incentives to eligible EV owners. Despite these efforts towards innovation and energy management, General Motors saw a 4% decline in its share price over the last month. This decline occurred amidst broader market volatility driven by uncertainty surrounding potential tariffs announced by...
Important Articles.title: General Motors (NYSE:GM) Partners With EnergyHub For U.S. Grid Incentives Amid 10% Share Dip

Important Articles.headline: President Trump made good on his tariff promise for foreign made autos, slapping 25% tariffs across the board on foreign-made automobiles.
Important Articles.title: Trump makes good on auto tariff threat with 25% levy on foreign-made cars

Important Articles.headline: GM sells 442,000 vehicles in China in Q1, almost flat year over year but down sequentially. With rising local competition, GM faces a tough battle ahead.
Important Articles.title: How's General Motors Faring in China Amid Fierce Competition?

Important Articles.headline: Trump's tariffs have thrown the auto industry into turmoil, with Canada hitting back. Consumers and automakers now brace up for rising costs and disruptions.
Important Articles.title: Canada's Retaliatory Tariffs Fuel Trump's Trade War, Roil Auto Sector
